label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_029
content:

### Events
- Increased resolver prefetch coverage to 88%; verified no adverse effects on authoritative QPS patterns.
- Performed month-end reconciliation: zones/records counts matched between on-prem exports and cloud-managed inventory for migrated set.
- Validated backup and restore procedure for zone data in cloud provider; completed restore drill on a non-production zone.
- Reviewed upcoming cutover plan for remaining on-prem zones; updated checklist for AXFR freeze and final serial bump.

### On Call
- Shift: K. Shah

- Status: Normal
- Reconciliation and recovery drills completed.
